epics.title: Evidence Management System Enhancement
epics.description: Enhance the Evidence Management System with structured evidence format, categorization, search capabilities, and attachment support. This is the highest priority feature.

epics.title: CI/CD Pipeline Enhancement
epics.description: Set up comprehensive CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions workflows, code quality checks, and security scanning.

epics.title: Documentation Enhancement
epics.description: Create comprehensive project documentation including user guides, API references, and architecture documentation.

epics.title: n8n Automation Integration
epics.description: Integrate n8n automation middleware with webhook support, API integration, and workflow templates.
